jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Roles and Responsibilities 
To be the brand guardian of Gojek externally and internally. This person will play a key role in the organization as he/she will be taking the lead in influencing all stakeholders on where the brand is headed.  

The key responsibilities will include: 
● Building team capabilities to take Gojek brand to new heights 
● Developing and advocating the brand strategy,  brand portfolio architecture, and brand guidelines of Gojek across the organization ● Developing thematic customer facing campaigns with long term equity and salience objective  
● Developing strategy and standard implementation playbook across regions based on penetration stage 
● Building cadences with regional teams to identify growth opportunities from a platform brand/multi-service level 
● Using Quantitative & Qualitative research data to come up with sharp consumer insights and compelling message propositions 
● Developing campaign reporting, metrics measurements, analysis and recommendations 
● Functioning as the ultimate gatekeeper of brand guidelines compliance across all channels and all regions 
● Setting up brand health study and continuously assessing key metrics in collaboration with Research 
● Running campaign pre-tests to optimize impact 
● Collaborating with platform growth and performance marketing to constantly improve platform acquisition, new user activation and multi-service usage experiments.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing or Business Administration (master’s degree is a plus)
  • Min. 8 years of working experience across relevant brand marketing roles:
  • Senior Brand Manager for a global consumer brand (ideally FMCG)
  • Mid-Senior Level in Brand Consultancy
  • Mandatory core competencies:
  • Deep understanding of marketing principles, brand building framework and communication strategy
  • Ability to synthesize insights from BI data and market research to inform marketing strategy
  • Basic knowledge on principles in integrated media strategy (offline-online), basics of buying models, media measurement
  • Excellent project management
  • Mandatory experience:
  • Being involved in a full cycle of brand development: development of total offer, running a total offer test and brand proposition ethnographic test, development of brand codes and guidelines, building a brand/portfolio architecture, leading implementation of brand guidelines, executing a brand launch, defining improvement plans based on result assessment
  • Creating brand narratives for product and corporate 
  • Handling integrated consumer marketing campaigns for local and global brands end to end
  • Building and developing a team
  • Budget planning and management
  • KPI setting
  • Highly motivated and self-driven individual
  • Observant to consumer behaviors and trend shifts on global, national, and local region levels
  • Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Ability to persuade and influence is a must.
  • Highly confident and capable in leading massive cross-functional efforts and coordination
  • Comfortable in communicating and presenting to senior management
  • Able to set a clear vision for the brand, define the milestones to achieve it, and has the passion and persistence to influence the bigger organization to move towards it
